noFundsBody:
We have not been able to place your bet.
Please check your updated balance.
invalidBody:
There has been an error in your browser, 
please refresh.
invalidBetBody:
One or more of your bets is incomplete.
Please make sure you complete all your bets.
maxBetBody:
You have exceeded the maximum stake of
 %1 allowed for this bet.
accountFailureBody:
Please log into your account.
If you were previously logged in,
your session may have expired.
maxWinBody:
You have reached the maximum winnings limit of %1.
Your current game will now end and your winnings
will be credited to your balance.
serverErrorBody:
There has been an error in your browser, 
please refresh.
connectionBody:
You have been disconnected from the gaming server. 
Please check your internet connection.
unknownBody:
There has been an error in your browser, 
please refresh.
